Package com.binance.connector.futures.client.impl

Class UMWebsocketClientImpl

java.lang.Object
com.binance.connector.futures.client.impl.WebsocketClientImpl
com.binance.connector.futures.client.impl.UMWebsocketClientImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
WebsocketClient
public class UMWebsocketClientImpl extends WebsocketClientImpl

USDâ“ˆ-M Websocket Streams

All stream endpoints under the Websocket Market Streams and User Data Streams section of the API documentation will be implemented in this class.
Response will be returned as callback.

  • Method Details

    • allMarkPriceStream

      public int allMarkPriceStream(int speed, com.binance.connector.futures.client.utils.WebSocketCallback onMessageCallback)
      Mark price and funding rate for all symbols pushed every 3 seconds or every second.

      <symbol>@markPrice or <symbol>@markPrice@1s

      Update Speed: 3000ms or 1000ms
      Parameters:
      speed - speed in seconds, can be 1 or 3
      onMessageCallback - onMessageCallback
      Returns:
      int - Connection ID
      See Also:
      • https://binance-docs.github.io/apidocs/futures/en/#mark-price-stream-for-all-market

    • allMarkPriceStream

      public int allMarkPriceStream(int speed, com.binance.connector.futures.client.utils.WebSocketCallback onOpenCallback, com.binance.connector.futures.client.utils.WebSocketCallback onMessageCallback, com.binance.connector.futures.client.utils.WebSocketCallback onClosingCallback, com.binance.connector.futures.client.utils.WebSocketCallback onFailureCallback)
      Same as allMarkPriceStream(int, WebSocketCallback) plus accepts callbacks for all major websocket connection events.
      Parameters:
      speed - speed in seconds, can be 1 or 3
      onOpenCallback - onOpenCallback
      onMessageCallback - onMessageCallback
      onClosingCallback - onClosingCallback
      onFailureCallback - onFailureCallback
      Returns:
      int - Connection ID

    • compositeIndexSymbolInfo

      public int compositeIndexSymbolInfo(String symbol, com.binance.connector.futures.client.utils.WebSocketCallback onMessageCallback)
      Composite index information for index symbols pushed every second.

      <symbol>@compositeIndex

      Update Speed: 1000ms
      Parameters:
      symbol - trading symbol
      onMessageCallback - onMessageCallback
      Returns:
      int - Connection ID
      See Also:
      • https://binance-docs.github.io/apidocs/futures/en/#composite-index-symbol-information-streams

    • compositeIndexSymbolInfo

      public int compositeIndexSymbolInfo(String symbol, com.binance.connector.futures.client.utils.WebSocketCallback onOpenCallback, com.binance.connector.futures.client.utils.WebSocketCallback onMessageCallback, com.binance.connector.futures.client.utils.WebSocketCallback onClosingCallback, com.binance.connector.futures.client.utils.WebSocketCallback onFailureCallback)
      Same as compositeIndexSymbolInfo(String, WebSocketCallback) plus accepts callbacks for all major websocket connection events.
      Parameters:
      symbol - trading symbol
      onOpenCallback - onOpenCallback
      onMessageCallback - onMessageCallback
      onClosingCallback - onClosingCallback
      onFailureCallback - onFailureCallback
      Returns:
      int - Connection ID
